footer-desc: ECOKA JOINT STOCK COMPANY is a manufacturing and trading company of traditional handicraft products made from 100% natural materials such as water hyacinth, rattan, bamboo, macrame.
footer-address: Hamlet 2, Vinh Thuan Dong commune, Long My district, Hau Giang province
contact-title: Please contact us through the information below
contact-address-detail: Hamlet 2, Vinh Thuan Dong commune, Long My district, Hau Giang province
about-02: Is a manufacturing and trading company of traditional handicraft products from 100% natural materials such as water hyacinth, rattan, bamboo, macrame.
about-04: Ecoka originally was a handicraft production facility with over 4 years of experience from 2018 in producing environmentally friendly handicrafts from natural materials available in the Mekong Delta of Vietnam: water hyacinth, seagrass, rattan, bamboo... for international customers: USA, UK, France..
about-05: With a team of skilled craftsmen, thoroughly trained on product quality requirements, Ecoka ensures to deliver diverse in models, refined in each design with international quality standards.
about-06: Coming to Ecoka, you are assured to be satisfied with professional service style, guaranteed product quality, and reasonable prices
about-08: To become a Vietnamese brand of international stature in the field of manufacturing and exporting quality goods with environmentally friendly materials.
about-09: Not only to bring good things to customers, Ecoka also wants to create more job opportunities for the poor in the Mekong Delta and to guide young people's careers, with environmental protection as the business focus.
about-10: Ecoka's mission is to deliver quality, safe for health and the environment products, changing the habit of using plastic products for many people with the main goal of launching Vietnamese goods on the international market.
about-12: Becoming the leading trust symbol about the quality of consumer products friendly to the environment for both the Vietnamese and international markets.
about-15: Total area of 6500 square meters including workshops, offices, drying rooms, showrooms, warehouses, and packaging areas.
about-16: A team of 600 skilled workers with over 20 years of experience in traditional handicrafts, professionally trained on product quality requirements.
about-18: Current main markets: USA, CANADA, FRANCE.
about-19: Supplier of raw materials for domestic factories.
